The Mythical Zhiwu enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
